items.sentence: I\'m sure that Tom is just tired as you are.
I\'m sure that she will not come to see you.
You idiots are giving the school a bad name.
You look like a completely different person.
You may not remember me, but I remember you.
You need to hire an criminal defense lawyer.
I\'ve decided not to sing that song tonight.
I\'ve decided to give my old bicycle to Tom.
I\'ve decided to major in French in college.
I\'ve got a couple of announcements to make.
I used to often take walks along that river.
Just a second. This call might be important.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time alone.
I don\'t blame you for putting off our trip.
I don\'t feel that I can trust what he says.
I don\'t feel up to eating anything tonight.
You still don\'t know what happened, do you?
You used to have a crush on me, didn\'t you?
You went to the park yesterday, didn\'t you?
You won\'t believe what Tom just said to me.
